mapper.select: select name,path,href from "tb_document_msg_file_info" where uniquefileid = #{uniquefileid} and status='1'
select uniquefileid,name,type,path,href from "tb_document_msg_file_info" where href like CONCAT('',#{path},'%')
select count(1) from tb_document_msg_file_info where path = #{path} and status = '1'
mapper.delete: DELETE from tb_document_msg_file_info where id not in(select max(id) from tb_document_msg_file_info group by path)
